# simple-mptrie
mptrie but uses sqlite to store proofs


## Build
```
go build -o mptrie
```

## Running
```
./mptrie
```

## Output console
```
Proof 11: e3b0c44298fc1c149afbf4c8996fb92427ae41e4649b934ca495991b7852b855
```
